20110123013716.000|20110123013722.000|CC1|COPS GOT LAID OFF THIS WEEK.    
20110123013722.000|20110123013722.000|CC1|DOZENS OF FIREFIGHTERS PACKED   
20110123013722.000|20110123013723.000|CC1|THEIR GEAR.

20110123013726.000|20110123013732.000|CC1|OF THAT DEPARTMENT AS WELL.     
20110123013732.000|20110123013733.000|CC1|PIECE                           
20110123013733.000|20110123013734.000|CC1|HE HAS FOUR CHILDREN.           
20110123013734.000|20110123013734.000|CC1|>> ONE IN COLLEGE AND ONE WHOSE 
20110123013734.000|20110123013738.000|CC1|TUITION IS $53,000 A YEAR.      
20110123013738.000|20110123013738.000|CC1|IT IS A HARD HIT.               
20110123013738.000|20110123013739.000|CC1|>> INSTEAD OF PROTECTING AND    
20110123013739.000|20110123013740.000|CC1|SERVING THE PUBLIC THE RESIDENTS
20110123013740.000|20110123013741.000|CC1|OF CAMDEN, THEY CHOSE TO PROTECT
20110123013741.000|20110123013743.000|CC1|THEIR HIGH SALARY.

20110123015424.000|20110123015427.000|CC1|     EASE ARTHRITIS SYMPTOMS.   
20110123015427.000|20110123015429.000|CC1|    BUT IF YOU HAVE ARTHRITIS,  
20110123015429.000|20110123015429.000|CC1|          STAYING ACTIVE        
20110123015429.000|20110123015431.000|CC1|        CAN BE DIFFICULT.       
20110123015431.000|20110123015431.000|CC1|      PRESCRIPTION CELEBREX     
20110123015431.000|20110123015433.000|CC1| CAN HELP RELIEVE ARTHRITIS PAIN
20110123015433.000|20110123015433.000|CC1|           SO YOUR BODY         
20110123015433.000|20110123015436.000|CC1|       CAN STAY IN MOTION.      
20110123015436.000|20110123015436.000|CC1|         BECAUSE JUST ONE       
20110123015436.000|20110123015438.000|CC1|       200MG CELEBREX A DAY     
20110123015438.000|20110123015440.000|CC1|    CAN PROVIDE 24 HOUR RELIEF  
20110123015440.000|20110123015440.000|CC1|   FOR MANY WITH ARTHRITIS PAIN 
20110123015440.000|20110123015443.000|CC1|        AND INFLAMMATION.       
20110123015443.000|20110123015444.000|CC1|    PLUS, IN CLINICAL STUDIES,  
20110123015444.000|20110123015444.000|CC1|  CELEBREX IS PROVEN TO IMPROVE 
20110123015444.000|20110123015447.000|CC1|     DAILY PHYSICAL FUNCTION    
20110123015447.000|20110123015449.000|CC1|       SO MOVING IS EASIER.     
20110123015449.000|20110123015451.000|CC1| AND CELEBREX IS NOT A NARCOTIC.
20110123015451.000|20110123015451.000|CC1|    WHEN IT COMES TO RELIEVING  
20110123015451.000|20110123015453.000|CC1|       YOUR ARTHRITIS PAIN,     
20110123015453.000|20110123015453.000|CC1|       YOU AND YOUR DOCTOR      
20110123015453.000|20110123015455.000|CC1|   NEED TO BALANCE THE BENEFITS 
20110123015455.000|20110123015456.000|CC1|         WITH THE RISKS.        
20110123015456.000|20110123015456.000|CC1|     ALL PRESCRIPTION NSAIDS,   
20110123015456.000|20110123015458.000|CC1|       INCLUDING CELEBREX,      
20110123015458.000|20110123015458.000|CC1|     MAY INCREASE THE CHANCE    
20110123015458.000|20110123015500.000|CC1|    OF HEART ATTACK OR STROKE,  
20110123015500.000|20110123015501.000|CC1|     WHICH CAN LEAD TO DEATH.   
20110123015501.000|20110123015501.000|CC1|      THIS CHANCE INCREASES     
20110123015501.000|20110123015503.000|CC1|    IF YOU HAVE HEART DISEASE   
20110123015503.000|20110123015503.000|CC1|         OR RISK FACTORS        
20110123015503.000|20110123015506.000|CC1|   SUCH AS HIGH BLOOD PRESSURE  
20110123015506.000|20110123015506.000|CC1|     OR WHEN NSAIDS ARE TAKEN   
20110123015506.000|20110123015508.000|CC1|        FOR LONG PERIODS.       
20110123015508.000|20110123015509.000|CC1|   NSAIDS, INCLUDING CELEBREX,  
20110123015509.000|20110123015509.000|CC1|  INCREASE THE CHANCE OF SERIOUS
20110123015509.000|20110123015512.000|CC1|    SKIN OR ALLERGIC REACTIONS  
20110123015512.000|20110123015512.000|CC1|     OR STOMACH AND INTESTINE

20110123015514.000|20110123015515.000|CC1|   SUCH AS BLEEDING AND ULCERS, 
20110123015515.000|20110123015515.000|CC1| WHICH CAN OCCUR WITHOUT WARNING
20110123015515.000|20110123015518.000|CC1|       AND MAY CAUSE DEATH.     
20110123015518.000|20110123015518.000|CC1|   PATIENTS ALSO TAKING ASPIRIN 
20110123015518.000|20110123015520.000|CC1|         AND THE ELDERLY

20110123015520.000|20110123015523.000|CC1|   STOMACH BLEEDING AND ULCERS.
